snippet: In a speech, she promised the number of refugees would drop, but also spoke against those who “try to whip up sentiment against strangers.”
abstract: German Chancellor Angela Merkel defends her immigration policies before gathering of her Christian Democratic Union party officials, responding to criticism about her refusal to cap number of new arrivals of refugees and migrants.
